alert.note: Alert for Covington; Smith (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 24 at 4:24PM CDT until August 28 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT THIS EVENING... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of central Mississippi, east central Mississippi, south central Mississippi and southeast Mississippi, including the following counties, in central Mississippi, Simpson and Smith. In east central Mississippi, Clarke and Jasper. In south central Mississippi, Jefferson Davis. In southeast Mississippi, Covington and Jones. * WHEN...Until 615 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 423 PM CDT, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Flooding is already occurring in the warned area. Between 5 and 9 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Laurel, Ellisville, Magee, Collins, Mendenhall, Stringer, Pinola, Union, Taylorsville, Prentiss, Mount Olive, Sandersville, Heidelberg, Hebron, Center Ridge, Sanford, Moss, Lone Star, Moselle and Clem. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
